name: Summer Hat Parati Royal - 2 in 1 Reversible
description:
Beautiful, red print in one side , and plain royal blue on the other, to go perfect with the mood of the day.

Made and lined with 100% designer cotton, giving you 2 options of use, can be washed and dried.

It has elastic in the back so will fit any head.

this hat is hand made by me, as all my products

Have a fabric request? let us know we will gladly arrange it for you

PS: This hat is READY to ship, also note that the fabric placement may vary within pieces.

Custom orders welcome
wholesale available

name: Bag Carmem - Scrapbook Green
description:
this bag is made with the most beautiful fabric l ever bought in my life, it is full of small detais like birds, butterflies etc.

it is reinforced with 100% industrial cotton, and has cotton straps. lnside have 2 pockets, one with zipper and one flat.

measurements 13"x17"x4" the straps are 18" when bag is open and 23 when bag is hanging in your shoulders. don't forget this is a handmade item and measurements are approx.

Wholesale Available on MOST of my items.

name: Bag Messenger Style Dragon Black
description:
Made with this beautiful dragon fabric paired with black satin on the outside pockets, piping and red satin inside lining, 2 elastic pockets on the outside, that you can use for things you need quick as cell phone, keys etc,inside has one pocket with zipper and one with elastic 

zipper closure

This messenger style bag can be use on your shoulders or across your body, any way you will have a beautifull spacious bag to carry everything.


we lined our bags with industrial cotton to give a body without leving the bag stiff.

Enjoy

name: Bag Body Me Geisha Wine Caramel
description:
Simple but yet diferent. not much to say about this bag.

It has caramel satin piping and lining, with a zipper pocket.

The straps has elastic for comfort.

Between the layers of fabrics we use a industrial cotton to give body to your bag, without making stiff.

We also have that in blue
